skins.shipDescription: Second ship of the Fusou-class battleships, Yamashiro.
skins.selfIntroduction: Um... I'm big sister Fusou's little sister, Yamashiro! Neither of us have really had good fortune since we were born, but I've grown up well thanks to big sis! Please don't judge me by my looks... I was once the flagship of the Combined Fleet! Planes...? What are those? Can I eat them?
skins.acquisition: Woah! It's Milord! Milord in person! Um... I'm Yamahi-, Yamashiro! I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
skins.login: Milord, milord! What shall we do today?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Milord, Milord! Waah~! ...Thank you, milord. I have always tipped over easily, but I am used to it now.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, do you want to jog with me? I want to become a little faster.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The vase in the hallway broke... It wasn't me, I swear! It just jumped off right as I walked past it...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah! Watch out, Milord! I'm about to fire my main gun!

skins.shipDescription: Milord! I can do anything now~ bombardment or aerial strikes! So, the thing is, you can totally count on me, much much more, Milord! Milord~!
skins.acquisition: Milord! I can do anything now~ bombardment or aerial strikes! So, the thing is, you can totally count on me, much much more, Milord! Milord~!
skins.details: Milord~ Was I able to be of use to you?
skins.secretaryIdle1: If I can be of use to you, Milord, I'll do anything...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord! Milord! I think I've gotten faster! Did you notice? Uu... I'll... try harder...
skins.secretaryIdle3: With my flying friends around, I won't need to light fires with my main cannons to cook anymore~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord! Milord! Did you know? I used new bath salts last night~!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ahh!! Milord, watch out! My seaplanes are going to run into you!!

skins.shipDescription: Milord, Milord, I've finished changing! What do you think? Do you like Yamashiro's new outfit?
skins.acquisition: Milord, Milord, I've finished changing! What do you think? Do you like Yamashiro's new outfit?
skins.login: Milord, welcome back... Wooooah! Ehehe... I've lost track of the number of times you've had to catch me~
skins.details: Milord, how was my Kaguya dance? Fusou taught me this dance to help get rid of bad luck!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Milord, let me help clean your ears!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, when spring comes around, let's go view the cherry blossoms!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Milord, want to take a nap in Yamashiro's lap?
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord, I want to touch you as well! *Rub rub~ pat pat~*!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Milord, you can get lovey-dovey with Yamashiro all you want! Mmhmm!

skins.shipDescription: It’s just not summer without beach volleyball! Ah... Milord, you’re not playing? But I went through all this effort to pick out a swimsuit...
skins.acquisition: It’s just not summer without beach volleyball! Ah... Milord, you’re not playing? But I went through all this effort to pick out a swimsuit...
skins.login: Milord, Milord! Would you help me practice volleyball? It’d be too embarrassing if I let Cygnet beat me...
skins.details: Milord, I heard that koi streamers can bring good fortune, so I brought some with me~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hawawa! The volleyball is coming my yay! When I stand next to Shigure, I always seem to get hit by things...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ugh... I still can’t light this fire. Stand back, Milord, I’m going to try using my cannons!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Fusou tied this bell to my tail so I don’t have to worry about getting bitten by fish when I’m napping at sea... She’s so nice!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ah, Milord! I’m trying to find the best spot to watch fireworks! Want to join me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah...! Milord, next time, say "hi" to me first! I almost rammed my main gun right into you!

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas! Milord, milord, how do I look? Is my Christmas outfit pretty? Ehehe~ Big sis also praised me today!
skins.acquisition: Merry Christmas! Milord, milord, how do I look? Is my Christmas outfit pretty? Ehehe~ Big sis also praised me today!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I sprained my ankle on accident... Uuu... Milord, can you help me massage it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, milord, when it's New Years... will you come see my sister and me perform Kagura?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Woah... Milord, milord, it's a snowy Christmas!
skins.secretaryTouch: Merry Christmas! I've already wrapped up a lot of presents! Milord, would you like to pick one out?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Milord... that's not the spot I sprained!

skins.shipDescription: Fusou told me that I have to wear a Western-style dress to the banquet, so she got one for me! Milord, Milord, isn't this dress pretty?
skins.acquisition: Fusou told me that I have to wear a Western-style dress to the banquet, so she got one for me! Milord, Milord, isn't this dress pretty?
skins.login: Heheh~? Going to a banquet with Milord... Hawawa?! Milord, how long have you been standing there?
skins.details: Banquets are a lot of fun! Next time, we should have a Sakura-style banquet and invite everyone from the other camps!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Milord, Milord, what's this? And this? There are so many things I haven't experienced before, my head's spinning!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, are you sure you'd like to take someone like me to the banquet...? I won't make you look bad, right?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Shigure, don't do anything weird at the banquet. You'll bother the others!
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord, Milord, I hear that there will be dancing at the banquet! Would it be okay for me to dance with you?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: M-Milord! It's going to be troublesome if everyone sees us!

skins.shipDescription: Milord, Milord, welcome to the store! Yamashiro is a sales clerk today! Mhm, I'll do my best!
skins.acquisition: Milord, Milord, welcome to the store! Yamashiro is a sales clerk today! Mhm, I'll do my best!
skins.login: Milord! Akashi told me to help her out by being a sales clerk today! What do you think about my outfit? Err, huh? It looks funny...?
skins.details: I asked Fusou to prepare this outfit for me! Ehehe, Fubuki and I are going to work hard together!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Milord, we have new goodies! Want to take a look? ~☆
skins.secretaryIdle2: Fubuki, why are you wearing that... I mean, it's cute, but... Maybe it's best not to think too much about it! Mhm!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Shigure, are you shopping with Yuudachi and the others today? Jeez, you should bring Nowaki with you once in a while...
skins.secretaryTouch: Um, Milord, I can't give you a discount on that.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Milord, you also think this outfit is super cute, right?

skins.shipDescription: Uwaah! M-Milord?! I'm so, so sorry... You didn't get hurt, did you? Um... This is my school uniform. Fusou tailored it for me, hehe~ ... Awawa! I should head off to class now! See you later!
skins.acquisition: Uwaah! M-Milord?! I'm so, so sorry... You didn't get hurt, did you? Um... This is my school uniform. Fusou tailored it for me, hehe~ ... Awawa! I should head off to class now! See you later!
skins.login: Milord, here's your bento~ I made it myself!
skins.details: Milord, Milord, my friends from the other camps taught me all kinds of neat stuff! To thank them, I also taught them about some of our traditional games!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Milord, Milord! I want to start a Miko Club at school to help people better understand the work that Fusou and I do! Um, but right now, we still haven't recruited enough members...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, I only learned this recently, but ship magazines are really complex... Um, I'll study harder, so that nothing bad will happen to mine again! School is so much fun! I wish Fusou could be here with us as well... But, um, wouldn't it make more sense for her to be a teacher?
skins.secretaryTouch: It was so romantic when I bumped into Commander when I turned around the corner... Maybe next time, I'll wait there on purpose... Eek! Ah, um, you didn't hear anything!
